product_name: The North Face Freedom Shell Pants - Men's Tall Sizes
long_description: The Freedom shell pants from The North Face deliver waterproof protection, a relaxed fit and a long inseam for your days on the mountain, whether plowing through the pow or getting air in the park. 2-layer HyVent(R) shell pants are waterproof, windproof and breathable; seams are sealed to prevent moisture from seeping through. Chimney Venting(TM) design uses StretchVent(TM) gaiters and zippered outer thigh vents with mesh gussets to let you control airflow and your comfort. Shell pants have a long inseam along with a relaxed fit; articulated knees for excellent freedom of movement. Rip-and-stick tabs on waistband adjust the fit; zippered, snap-closure fly. Zippered handwarmer pockets; single, roomy cargo pocket. The North Face Freedom shell pants feature reinforced cuffs that resist abrasion from boots, boards and skis.
short_description: The Freedom shell pants from The North Face deliver waterproof protection, a relaxed fit and a long inseam for your days on the mountain, whether plowing through the pow or getting air in the park.
